title: Cassiopeia NEW SPLASH ART?!?!
body: Hey guys, I thought league of legends needed a cassiopeia splash art! So I came up with this :)) enjoy. {{champion:69}} [](http://imgur.com/9Z8j0uN) You can see the resemblance ay?

replies.body: The jokes gone bro it's not really funny anymore

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=rEkcllvu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-01T06:48:55.741+0000)
>
> The jokes gone bro it's not really funny anymore

Do you think I give a crap? I'm posting for fun, your commenting for hate.
No one finds this "fun" anymore you just merely copied the original post in an attempt to receive applause as if you created the joke yourself

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=rEkcllvu,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-01T07:27:40.185+0000)
>
> No one finds this "fun" anymore you just merely copied the original post in an attempt to receive applause as if you created the joke yourself

Original Post? BRO? I MADE THIS IN SKETCH LEAGUE?
So what I assume your trying to say is that you made this up entirely on your own without any thought of the idea already been used?

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=rEkcllvu,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-01T08:05:08.626+0000)
>
> So what I assume your trying to say is that you made this up entirely on your own without any thought of the idea already been used?

 Okay first off, I made this while playing Sketch League. If you don't know what Sketch League is, its simply a game of pictionary. Where the website gives you a champion, item, abilities, quotes and you have to draw it and your friends guess it (Highly recommend you play this game with friends, it's really enjoyable especially if you and your friends suck at drawing with a mouse just search up sketchleague). The game basically asked me to draw Cassiopeia which I did and this was the result. I had no intention of copying anyone, you can even check my history, I've even posted an Urgot one, a couple weeks ago. 

Also if you have found this so called "Original Post" please link it, because I'm pretty sure I made this wonderful drawing of Cassiopeia; like it's not that hard to draw, just look at it.
